Item.Name: Good's Food to Go
Item.Content:
Good's Food to Go in Disney's Old Key West Resort, Disney's Old Key West Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Good's Food to Go

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001718.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
It’s all good! Burgers, hot dogs, sandwiches, salads, soups, desserts, snacks and beverages are all ready to grab and go. Or, enjoy a cheeseburger, pizza nachos or even chicken noodle soup at a shaded picnic table near the main pool.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Gurgling Suitcase
Item.Content:
Gurgling Suitcase in Disney's Old Key West Resort, Disney's Old Key West Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Gurgling Suitcase

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002243.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Belly up to this cozy little Key West-style bar and try the Turtle Krawl, Sultry Seahorse or your drink of choice inside or by the pool. Wine and domestic and imported beer are also served. Hungry, too? The lunch and dinner menu from Olivia's Cafe is available!
  Cuisine: American
